page.title: 08Attitudes _ St James's
page.content: In Egerton, the Church is the heart of the Community. The earliest houses and many of the most recent cluster around St James's. Our villagers built the church as a place of worship, a finger pointing to heaven, a reminder of God in our midst. As a place to pray, a registry of village life, in birth, marriage and death, of celebration and remembrance, of meetings, schooling and music, as a depot for the relief of the poor and sick; As a springboard for community life; As a heart to their society. St James's still stands, sharing our sorrows and joys. Celebrating in God's love, family ties; understanding frailties and fractiousness. As ever, showing God among us, awaiting our recognition.
